name: ListBusinessServices
description:
Retrieve a list of existing business services.

Use this tool to retrieve information about business services that span multiple technical services and may involve various teams. Useful for gaining insights into cross-functional capabilities. Requires 'services.read' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: Specifies the versioning header for the 'Accept' field to determine API response format.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specify the content type for the request. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination for search results, useful for navigating through large sets of data.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: include_total_in_pagination
parameters.description: Include the total count in pagination responses for detailed data, set to true for inclusion.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.
